segments.text: Hey , look at my new shirt . What do you think about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just so-so . Where did you get it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought it on a street market . A real bargain !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd much rather buy expensive but good quality clothing , because it is not only nice but lasts a long time .
segments.speaker: S2
